title: Got Dced, and starting new game???
body:
Ok, I was playing game as Soraka support, and for some reason I got dced(I had ethernet cord connected to router right below my desk).
So, I restard the client, and I was back to the game home screen. I was confused because we were neither losing nor wining, so the game coudln't have ended in 30 seconds that i was dced.

It's not even in my match history.

So I went to Lobby and re-started the rank game..ever had this problem?

replies.body:
Same thing happened me right now, played a velkoz game, got dced, and no history or no reconnect, 
waiting to see if i get a penalty, but i could start a new game straight away... and had no chanse to reconnect so :/

Yeah, nothing has happened since, but I don't know whether it will resurface or not.
First time happening since playing from S5

Hmm yeah I see an unfinished game with Soraka earlier, and it doesn't look like anyone got penalties or stat adjustments for it.  Not really sure what happened here, the game server may have had an issue and caused the match to disappear.  Is everything okay now?
